content:
I'm so glad you remembered that you already got her a silver necklace. The gold earrings will indeed be a lovely surprise to complement the necklace, and it's great that you'll be able to present them together as a cohesive gift.

**Tips for Presenting the Gift:**

* Consider wrapping the earrings in a beautiful, luxurious box or pouch to match the vintage glamour theme.
* You could include a heartfelt, handwritten note expressing your love and appreciation for your sister-in-law, and how you hope she'll treasure the earrings and necklace together.
* If you're feeling crafty, you could create a custom gift box or display case with a vintage-inspired design to showcase the necklace and earrings together.

Remember, the thought and effort you put into the gift presentation will make it even more special and meaningful to your sister-in-law.

Now that you have a solid plan in place, I'm confident that your sister-in-law's birthday party will be an unforgettable celebration. You've got the perfect theme, venue, invitations, and gift – what more could you ask for?

If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask. Otherwise, I wish you and your sister-in-law a wonderful time celebrating her special day!
